execution.format_instructions:
The output should be formatted as a JSON instance that conforms to the JSON schema below.

As an example, for the schema {"properties": {"foo": {"title": "Foo", "description": "a list of strings", "type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}}}, "required": ["foo"]}
the object {"foo": ["bar", "baz"]} is a well-formatted instance of the schema. The object {"properties": {"foo": ["bar", "baz"]}} is not well-formatted.

Here is the output schema:
```
{"description": "Pydantic model for the ReAct agent's output. ", "properties": {"thought": {"description": "Your current thought.", "title": "Thought", "type": "string"}, "action": {"description": "The tool to use.", "title": "Action", "type": "string"}, "tools_input": {"description": "The input to the action.", "title": "Tools Input", "type": "object"}, "observation": {"description": "Your observation.", "title": "Observation", "type": "string"}}, "required": ["thought", "action", "tools_input", "observation"]}
```
